```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(Biostatistics)
```


```{r}
depth <- read_xlsx('MC_WaterDepth_Olivia.xlsx') %>% na.omit()
depth$Month <- format(as.Date(depth$`Date/Time`), "%m/%Y")

#getting it to group by month and then average it out!
average <- aggregate(Depth ~ Month, depth, FUN = mean)
```
